-| wi(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmbf), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c2)), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2)), cmbf))))
-| wi(w0, wss(c3, cr))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, c3), nat0))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c3)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c3))), wceq(c1, c2))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmbf), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c2)), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2)), cmbf))))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmbf)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c3, cr))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, c3), nat0))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c3)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c3))), wceq(c1, c2))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc))

comment: If two functions are equal almost everywhere, then one is measurable iff the other is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2014.)
